title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 11.3 - Conferences
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 11.3 - Conferences

State Regulations

As required by section
324 (1)(f)
of the Public Health Law, every local health officer, as defined in section
11.1
of this Part, shall, when so requested, attend conferences called by the commissioner or his authorized representative. A failure to attend, without good cause, shall be deemed just cause for removal of such local health officer pursuant to applicable provisions of the Public Health Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
11.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
